entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of thunderstorms early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:32 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 1:32 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:32 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
